description: The nurse at the all-girls boarding school. She came along on the trip as the girls` supervisor. The Baka Trio, especially Bacchi-Guu, are enamoured by Chigusa`s beauty and her E-cup breasts. Although she should be keeping the girls in order, Chigusa is very easy-going and actually encourages the girls to flirt with the boys.
name: Iino Chigusa
